The Consequence of an Unsurrendered Life

TEXT: Luke 16:19-31

Introduction - DO? Luke 14:11-35

- The Trap

The Message (Consider the Gospel of Luke as a whole)

Doing the Word of God, is the fruit of a surrendered life.

The Call

... Blessed is he that shall EAT BREAD IN THE KINGDOM OF GOD.

I. Hell is a Real Place, Luke 14:23

  • Hell: conscious eternal punishment

False Doctrine

1. Universalism

All IN THE END are saved. “There is a hell, but its created fo the devil and angels only.” “Hell is there, possible no one will go there.”

2. Inclusionism

The Consequence of an Unsurrendered Life

TEXT: Luke 16:19-31

Introduction - DO? Luke 14:11-35

- The Trap

The Message (Consider the Gospel of Luke as a whole)

Doing the Word of God, is the fruit of a surrendered life.

The Call

... Blessed is he that shall EAT BREAD IN THE KINGDOM OF GOD.

I. Hell is a Real Place, Luke 14:23

  • Hell: conscious eternal punishment

False Doctrine

1. Universalism

All IN THE END are saved. “There is a hell, but its created fo the devil and angels only.” “Hell is there, possible no one will go there.”

2. Inclusionism

Some will go to Hell, only those who have hear the Gospel and

rejected, but those who have never heard the gospel will be saved ultimately.

3. Annihilationism

“Consciousness extinguished.” “No longer exist.”“ “The Fire that consumes” “Soul Sleep” “feels fair” Matthew 10:28

DESTROY: apollumi STRONGS#622 to destroy, destroy utterly
[an adjective sharing closely same meaening is Apollyon, Destroyer STRONGS#623, Rev. 9:11]

Matthew 2:13 - Herod desired to “DESTROY” the baby
Matthew 8:25 - disciples afriad of drowning, “we PERISH”
Luke 15 - LOST coin, son, lamb
Luke 5:37 - ruined wineskin “bottles shall PERISH”

Selected Verses

Jeremiah 4:4 — … My wrath will go forth like fire And burn with none to quench it…
Deuteronomy 4:24 ; Deuteronomy 32:2; Matthew 3:12; 2 Samuel 22:6; Job 26:6; Psalm 9:17 ; Psalm 16:10 (Acts 2:27); Psalm 139:8; Isaiah 30:33 ; Isaiah 66:24 — 24 [Undying Worm and Unquenchable Fire ]; Ezekiel 32:27; Daniel 12:2; Habakkuk 2:7; Nahum 1:6; Malachi 3:2; Matthew 5:22; Matthew 5:29,30 ; Matthew 10:28 ; Matthew 13:42; Matthew 18:8,9; Matthew 23:15; Matthew 25:30; Matthew 25:41; Matthew 25:46; Matthew 26:24; lMark 9:44; Luke 12:5; Luke 16:19-31; Acts 1:25; 2 Thessalonians 1:9; 2 Peter 2:4; Jude 7; Jude 13 ; Revelation 2:11; Revelation 6:8; Revelation 14:9-11;

  • Lake of Fire - The Second Death - Revelation 2:11; Revelation 19:20 ; Revelation 20:10; Revelation 20:14 [1 Cor. 15:26]; Revelation 20:15; Revelation 21:8

rejected, but those who have never heard the gospel will be saved ultimately.

3. Annihilationism
